name: dfs.client.max.block.acquire.failures
explanation: The log indicates a speculative attempt, which might be due to multiple failures in acquiring block information from a specific datanode. This configuration option sets the maximum number of such failures allowed.

name: dfs.client.failover.sleep.base.millis
explanation: The log indicates a speculative attempt, which might be due to failover attempts. This configuration option sets the base time to wait between failover attempts.

name: hadoop.zk.timeout-ms
explanation: The log indicates a speculative attempt, which might be due to a timeout in the ZooKeeper session. This configuration option sets the ZooKeeper session timeout.
